data.author: Valtiel

changelog.release_notes:
- Added support for Chalk
- Changed battery icon
- Added appid when using weather api
- Fixed memory leaks for background events (fish, seagull). Sorry.
- Added more error handling and fixed minor bug

+ Added weather information (Only celsius at the moment)
  + Changed Valtiel.com font
  + Changed date font and format
  + Fixed memory leaks, sorry :(

Added seagull background event. :D
Changed the algorithm for choosing an event.
Implemented persist_store to save/load contribution state on the watch.

Fixed slow speed.
Removed white pixels around palm tree.
Moved date and battery position to better fit the screen.
Removed preview text.

data.description:
A beautiful tropical island with rippling water, coconut palm tree and a stranded man. The stranded man occupies his time with various activities on your pebble watch. It show the time 24h/12h and date with a stranded man going around the island. The app only consume power when you are using Pebble watch and otherwise the stranded man is sleeping and preserve power.

Features:
✔ Virtual man and watch in a single app
✔ Different animations and background events
✔ Show date, time and battery status
✔ Show current temperature and weather at your location
✔ Funny animations to watch and minimal battery use when inactive
✔ More updates to come, follow on valtiel.com

If you like the app please support it by contributing on valtiel.com. It will be very appreciated and you will support me in making more updates with new animations. 

Important note!
The text "Valtiel.com" will disappear in the Pebble App if you add a user and contribute on valtiel.com

If you love the watchface, please give it a <3 and follow the progress for next update at valtiel.com
Thank you for using one of my Apps.

latest_release.release_notes:
